Company
Discover more about the business and people behind Paddl.
Paddl.com

helps users connect to valuable 'professional experiences' more relevant to the future of work, which builds a modern CV, the Paddl resume. The Paddl resume gives talent the ability to identify and understand the transferrable skills they have acquired through their professional journey, including casual or part-time work, volunteer work, hackathons, meetup events and more.
Through
Paddl.com
, users are able to identify, participate in and record these modern experiences, building up their experience profile and skill set, helping them to become better prepared for the future of work.

Paddl HQ is based in Melbourne, Australia, one of the top 10 education capitals of the world where a small team is working to make a big difference. Our global community is growing daily and businesses large and small are discovering a smarter, cheaper and more powerful way to recruit talented young professionals.
